title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: 4C/ID-Based Module for Enhancing Medical Case Presentation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can produce a 5-minute structured medical case presentation video following the 4-C/ID model.
Learners can perform verbal presentations connecting patient symptoms-diagnosis-treatment processes with over 80% logical accuracy.
Learners experience iterative improvement (3+ cycles) of case presentation clarity and professionalism through peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
